LoaderPath.name: LoaderPath
LoaderPath.description:
A loader for external assets, which assumes assets reside in a common base path, and are named as
the file element is named.

LoaderShader.description: A loader for external shader assets.

classitems.description: get the name of this named thing (if it has one).

return.description: the name of this node, or just "node".

classitems.description: Make the first letter of a string be upper case.

classitems.description: truncate a number to a specific precision, equivalent to discretization
classitems.name: fixNum

params.name: number
params.description: the number to discretize

params.name: precision
params.description: how many decimal places to force

classitems.description: zero pad a number to a specific width
classitems.name: padNum

params.name: number
params.description: the number to pad

params.name: width
params.description: how many places the final number should be

params.name: fill
params.description: the character to pad with (default is "0")

classitems.description:
provide a default value if the requested value is undefined. this is
here because the macro doesn't handle multiline values.
classitems.name: defaultValue

params.name: value
params.description: the value to test for undefined

params.name: defaultValue
params.description: the default value to provide if value is undefined

classitems.description:
provide a default value if the requested value is undefined by calling a function. this is
here because the macro doesn't handle multiline values.
classitems.name: defaultFunction

params.name: value
params.description: the value to test for undefined

params.name: defaultFunction
params.description: the function to call if value is undefined

classitems.description: create a reversed mapping from a given object (assumes 1:1 values)
classitems.name: reverseMap

params.name: mapping
params.description: the the object containing the mapping to be reversed

classitems.name: next

classitems.description: the initializer for a scene graph node.
classitems.name: construct

params.name: parameters
params.description:
an object with optional information to include in the node. The
possibilities are:
* transform {Float4x4}: a transformation matrix to apply before drawing or traversing children.
* state {function}: a parameter-less function to call before drawing or traversing children.
this function may set any render state needed.
* shape {string}: the name of a shape to draw.
* children: the node will have an array of children by default, but if the node is intended
to be a leaf, you can save the space and time associated with an empty list by setting this
value to "false".

classitems.description: add a child node (only applies to non-leaf nodes).
classitems.name: addChild

params.name: node
params.description: the node to add as a child.

classitems.description: draw this node's contents.
classitems.name: draw

params.name: standardUniforms
params.description:
the container for standard parameters, as documented in
Program

classitems.description:
traverse this node and its contents. this function is a place-holder that is replaced by the
actual function called depending on the parameters passed during construction.
classitems.name: traverse

params.name: standardUniforms
params.description:
the container for standard parameters, as documented in
Program

classitems.description: the initializer for a shader.
classitems.name: construct

params.name: parameters
params.description:
shader construction parameters
vertexShader name of the vertex shader to use
fragmentShader name of the fragment shader to use
attributeMapping maps POSITION, NORMAL, and TEXTURE attributes to the
attribute names in the shader. This allows the engine to manage the attributes without
forcing the shader author to use "standard" names for everything. Defaults to:
* POSITION_ATTRIBUTE: "inputPosition"
* NORMAL_ATTRIBUTE: "inputNormal"
* TEXTURE_ATTRIBUTE: "inputTexture"
* COLOR_ATTRIBUTE: "inputColor"
* MODEL_MATRIX_ATTRIBUTE: "inputModelMatrix"

parameterMapping maps standard parameters to the parameter names in the
shader. This allows the engine to manage setting the standard set of parameters on the shader
without forcing the shader author to use "standard" names. Defaults to:
* MODEL_MATRIX_PARAMETER: "modelMatrix"
* VIEW_MATRIX_PARAMETER: "viewMatrix"
* PROJECTION_MATRIX_PARAMETER: "projectionMatrix"
* CAMERA_POSITION: "cameraPosition"
* OUTPUT_ALPHA_PARAMETER: "outputAlpha"
* TEXTURE_SAMPLER: "textureSampler"
* MODEL_COLOR:"modelColor"
* AMBIENT_LIGHT_COLOR: "ambientLightColor"
* AMBIENT_CONTRIBUTION:"ambientContribution"
* LIGHT_DIRECTION: "lightDirection"
* LIGHT_COLOR:"lightColor"
* DIFFUSE_CONTRIBUTION:"diffuseContribution"
* SPECULAR_CONTRIBUTION:"specularContribution"
* SPECULAR_EXPONENT:"specularExponent"

classitems.description: set the standard shader parameters in one call.
classitems.name: setStandardUniforms

params.name: parameters
params.description:
a mapping of standard parameter names to values, as specified in
the initialization of the shader
